newsitem.title: USA: Gencor sees profits beating yr-ago's $1.55.
newsitem.headline: Gencor sees profits beating yr-ago's $1.55.

text.p: Gencor Industries Inc said it is enjoying a record year in both earnings and revenues, and expects profits to be significantly higher than last year's record earnings of $1.55 per share.
The company said it is making the projection after I/B/E/S International Inc erroneously reported that Gencor Industries had earned $1.44 per share this year.

Gencor Industries said I/B/E/S/ was in fact reporting earnings for Gencor Ltd, a South African Gold mining company, but erroneously reported the earnings per share figure using Gencor Industries' American Stock Exchange symbol, which is "GX."
Gencor Industries said the error caused a "serious" drop in its stock price as shareholders were anticipating better earnings than the $1.44 erroneously reported.
The company said it is in fact having an excellent year, and said it is enjoying record performance in both revenues and earnings.
